attributes.additional_details:
It's shameful that one of Britains greatest engineering triumphs is left to rust away on runways around the UK.

Concorde needs a shelter,  somewhere it can retire in peace. At the moment it's battling the UK's shocking weather and losing, badly. At this rate we will be saying good bye to one of Britains greatest engineering acheivements and what changed air travel for ever.

Save concorde.
